name: The Observed
description:
Will you survive the nightmare? Play as an urban explorer trapped in his old abandoned middle school. Not all is right in this broken-down building. Will you be able to escape? Or will you fall victim to the vicious spirits that roam the halls?

Those who are sensitive to epilepsy or similar conditions should be cautious with playing this game.

Made by a 2 person team in Unreal Engine 4.
Aaron Kaytor: https://thetoastynation.wixsite.com/mysite-1

Rahil Shafique: https://rahilshafique.wixsite.com/rahil-shafique
